data.name: The Chronicles Of Myrtana: Archolos - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Over thirty breathtaking tracks are composed solely for the purpose of mod. The entire soundtrack was recorded with live instruments, thanks to cooperation with the Andante's Inferno orchestra.

In addition to new interpretations of classic music from the entire Gothic trilogy, soundtrack includes completely new songs with the atmosphere of the original games.
